scripts.verify: npm run verify:ui && npm run verify:api && npm run verify:engine
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ui && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:engine
scripts.format: npm run format:ui && npm run format:api && npm run format:engine
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:api && npm run build:engine
scripts.build:ui: cd ui && npm run build || echo 'No build script in ui'
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm run build || echo 'No build script in api'
scripts.build:engine: cd engine && npm run build || echo 'No build script in engine'
scripts.check-configs: npm run check-configs:ui && npm run check-configs:api && npm run check-configs:engine
scripts.check-configs:ui: cd ui && npm run check-configs || echo 'No check-configs script in ui'
scripts.check-configs:api: cd api && npm run check-configs || echo 'No check-configs script in api'
scripts.check-configs:engine: cd engine && npm run check-configs || echo 'No check-configs script in engine'
